name: Grayshore
summary: Grayshore is a wind-carved coast of coves and drowned forts. Trade runs on fog and rumor. The old road appears at low tide.

low_tide_road.name: Low-Tide Road
low_tide_road.notes: Revealed twice nightly; stones slick with kelp.

drowned_fort.name: Drowned Fort
drowned_fort.notes: Bell still tolls beneath the waterline.

mistwardens.name: Mistwardens
mistwardens.notes: Lantern-keepers who map fog channels at night.

lore.summary: Grayshore is a wind-carved coast of coves and drowned forts. Trade runs on fog and rumor. The old road appears at low tide.

openers.title: Low-Tide Road
openers.summary: The road rises from the sea.

prompt_templates.scene_hooks:
- A bell tolls beneath the water.
- A gull drops a wax-sealed key on your boot.
- Scrimshaw maps hint at a shortcut.
prompt_templates.session_zero: You arrive where the road surfaces from the sea. A lantern bobs in the fog.
